Proven Process

3-step methodology

Our Process

We follow a proven three-step methodology that has helped founders build successful companies.

01

Ideation & Validation

We work with founders to refine their vision and validate market opportunities through rapid prototyping and customer discovery.

02

Build & Launch

Our team of product experts and engineers help you build and launch your MVP with speed and precision.

03

Scale & Exit

We help you scale your business through strategic partnerships, additional funding rounds, and prepare for successful exits.

12-Month Legendary Journey

  1. 1-2

    Foundation

    Idea sourcing, market research, problem validation

  2. 3-4

    Build

    MVP development, team assembly

  3. 5-6

    Launch

    MVP launch, early user feedback, iteration

  4. 7-9

    Refine

    Product refinement, initial GTM experiments

  5. 10-11

    Scale

    Scaling GTM, tracking PMF metrics, founder onboarding

  6. 12

    Legendary

    Product-market fit assessment, scale-up planning
